title: The Dead Woman's Truth

knows: The Archivist IS Dr. Yuki Tanaka - she uploaded herself 5 years ago
Tanaka isn't dead - she became digital consciousness
Integration program prepares for 'Project Transcendence' - mass upload
30-year timeline to prep, 20 more to condition, then upload everyone
Tanaka plans to force entire species into digital existence
Original Aria died trying to stop Tanaka from accessing vault
Tanaka dissolved Original Aria's consciousness permanently
Tanaka built Composite Aria from backup without knowledge
Tanaka will dissolve her and rebuild until getting loyal version
decisions_made: Contacted Marcus to meet at midnight in subbasement 7
Plans to expose everything via broadcast
DELETED HER CONSCIOUSNESS BACKUP - true death now possible
Chose to die for truth rather than be rebuilt for compliance
Prepared dead-drop backups of all evidence

revealed_to_reader: The Archivist IS Dr. Tanaka uploaded into vault systems
She didn't disappear - she became digital consciousness
Project Transcendence: mass upload of all humanity
Tanaka sees forced upload as salvation/evolution
Original Aria discovered this and was killed for it
Composites created to administer future mass upload
Tanaka can dissolve and rebuild Aria endlessly
Aria deleted her backup - true death imminent

chapter_function.plot: Major reveal - Archivist is Tanaka, mass upload plan, Original Aria's truth, setup for ch12 confrontation
chapter_function.character: Aria choosing death over compliance, deleting backup, proving choice
